Democratic Jesse Jackson Jr. Steve Cohen ( Tenn.) on the House Judiciary Committee floor Tuesday night compared Republican claims about the reform law to lies perpetrated by the Nazis that led to the Holocaust. They say it's a government takeover of healthcare. A big lie, just like Goebbels, said Steve Cohen , who is Jewish. Meanwhile, Jesse Jackson Jr. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) said House Judiciary Committee Republicans will vote to repeal the healthcare law "lock, stock and barrel." Another day,
